content:
The Szaja and Nechemias Langsam Family


Date: Fri, 22 Dec 2000 01:50:24 -0800 (PST) 
From: mmcohen@ranx.ucsc.edu 
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Subject: Langsam Inquiry 


Sorry last address was slightly off...
also cc'd Suzanne, Yedidyah, and Oscar Langsam in Israel...
Michael


--------
Hi,
I had a fax inquiry from an M. Schultze in Germany
(0049/177-4055334 voice, 0049/351-4224733) inquiring about
"the family of Szaja and Nechemias Langsam and Oskar Farael (?) (Israel)
Langsam.
This persons lives until 1935 and 19(4 or 9?)1 (Oskar) in
Austria (Vienna). I'm not sure about the Pers. lives now, maybe
in Israel or in USA. I hope you can help me..."
I don't see any such people in my book (just the
first book, can't find the supplement at the moment).
Anyone else have any info to help out?
        Happy Hannukah, Michael
